OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD WHITHAM ROAD SPIRITUALIST NATIONAL UNION CHURCH

Desc.entry: Part of the Spiritualist movement. Holds regular services and special meetings with mediums present. Offers occasional psychic workshops and awareness and development groups. Registered charity and company limited by guarantee no 71661.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Wed 11am-1pm (healing), Wed at 1.30pm & 7.30pm (Open Circle), Sat at 7.30pm (Open Circle), one Fri in the month (special demonstration), Sun at 6.30pm (Divine Service)
